thread.title: BREAKING NEWS: Bomb alert at Paris shopping centre - shoppers evacuated as police swoop in
thread.title_full: BREAKING NEWS: Bomb alert at Paris shopping centre - shoppers evacuated as police swoop in

title: BREAKING NEWS: Bomb alert at Paris shopping centre - shoppers evacuated as police swoop in
text:
BREAKING NEWS: Bomb alert at Paris shopping centre - shoppers evacuated as police swoop in BREAKING NEWS: Bomb alert at Paris shopping centre - shoppers evacuated as police swoop in A SHOPPING centre in Paris has been evacuated following reports of a bomb alert. PUBLISHED: 15:50, Wed, Feb 22, 2017 | UPDATED: 16:50, Wed, Feb 22, 2017 TWITTER The shopping centre in Paris has been evacuated 
Two suspects allegedly entered Vélizy 2 with a suspicious package and pressure cooker, according to local reports. 
Shoppers were evacuated just before 3.30pm (local time) as police investigate. 
There are reports the pressure cooker contained explosives. Related articles
